SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.View.CLI

Class CLIMain

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.View.CLI.CLIMain
All Implemented Interfaces:
View, PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class CLIMain extends Object implements View
Class to manage the Command Line Interface.
  • Create the client lock in common with ClientState, CLIPrint, ReadShell;
  • initial request:
    • Which connection protocol do you choose?
    • Which host do you use?
  • create the instance of:
    • ClientState;
    • CLIPrint;
    • ReadShell;
    • Networker (RMI or TCP).

  • Constructor Summary

    CLIMain()
    Initialize lock.
